wiki.summary: Beautiful is a song recorded by NCT 2021, the 2021 lineup of South Korean boy group NCT. It was released on December 14, 2021 as the second single of their third full-length album, Universe. The track was written by Yoo Young jin, who also composed and arranged the track with Yoo Han-jin. Members Taeyong, Mark, Johnny, Jeno and Hendery participated in writing the rap. Member Renjun revealed that Beautiful has existed before they debuted in 2016, and that the song was initially one of the debut singles for NCT U. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: Beautiful is a song recorded by NCT 2021, the 2021 lineup of South Korean boy group NCT. It was released on December 14, 2021 as the second single of their third full-length album, Universe. The track was written by Yoo Young jin, who also composed and arranged the track with Yoo Han-jin. Members Taeyong, Mark, Johnny, Jeno and Hendery participated in writing the rap. Member Renjun revealed that Beautiful has existed before they debuted in 2016, and that the song was initially one of the debut singles for NCT U. It was later replaced with WITHOUT YOU. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
